description.details: Silk Nodes pride ourselves on being 100% bare metal validators, running our own infrastructure to validate the chains we are active on, we are also proud to say we run IBC relayer nodes to help support the networks.

contributions.name: RPC, gRPC and API endpoints
contributions.description: We are currently providing public RPC, gRPC and API endpoints. https://rpc.evmos.silknodes.io/, https://api.evmos.silknodes.io/, https://grpc.evmos.silknodes.io/, https://grpcweb.evmos.silknodes.io/

contributions.name: IBC Relayer
contributions.description: We are currently relaying packets between Evmos and Osmosis with many more chains to follow.

infrastructures.stack_details: We pride ourselves on being 100% bare metal validators running our own infrastructure. We use Horcrux to ensure our keys are safe and secure.
